Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.amirov.implementor

Class UtilWords

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.amirov.implementor.UtilWords
public class UtilWords extends Object
Utility class containing constants and helper methods for the Implementor application.

    • smartJoin

      protected static <E> String smartJoin(E[] array, Function<E,String> function)
      Joins elements of an array into a single string with a specified delimiter.
      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of elements in the array.
      Parameters:
      array - The array to join.
      function - A function to process each element of the array.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the array elements, joined by a delimiter.

    • toUnicode

      public static String toUnicode(String s)
      Converts a string to its Unicode escape sequence equivalent.
      Parameters:
      s - The string to convert.
      Returns:
      A string where characters are replaced with their Unicode escape sequences.
